title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water. Fry pancetta until crispy. Whisk eggs and cheese together. Drain pasta, mix with pancetta, remove from heat, stir in egg mixture, and season with pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka paste for 1 hour. Grill until cooked. Simmer tomato puree with spices, add chicken, stir in cream, and cook until thickened.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken in a creamy tomato-based sauce.
instructions: Marinate chicken. Grill. Cook sauce. Combine with chicken and simmer.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: A quick and healthy stir fry with fresh vegetables and soy sauce.
instructions: Chop vegetables. Stir fry with garlic. Add soy sauce and serve.
